text: Christine Muzio (10 May 1951 - 29 November 2018) was a French fencer. She won a silver medal in the women's team foil event at the 1976 Summer Olympics and a gold in the same event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French female fencers Category:French foil fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for France Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:People from Creil Category:Medalists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oise
title: Christine Muzio
